thread.title: US government blocks release of new CIA torture details
thread.title_full: US government blocks release of new CIA torture details | News24

author: news24.com
title: US government blocks release of new CIA torture details
text:
Washington - US government officials have blocked the release of 116 pages of defence lawyers' notes detailing the torture of Guantanamo Bay detainee Abu Zubaydah while in CIA custody, defence lawyers said.
The treatment of Zubaydah, who lost one eye and was waterboarded 83 times in a single month while held by the CIA, according to government documents, has been the focus of speculation for years.
"We submitted 116 pages in 10 separate submissions," Joe Margulies, Zubaydah's lead defence lawyer, told Reuters news agency.
"The government declared all of it classified."
